TrackedCommunicationDetail.name: TrackedCommunicationDetail
TrackedCommunicationDetail.description: Stores additional information associated with TrackedCommunication records.

DetailCodeId.description: The code set or code set bundle that contains the information to be added to the tracked communication record. Select a detail code when the specified detail type is Category, Medium, Reason Code, or Payload.

DetailRecordId.description: The record that contains the information to be added to the tracked communication record. Select the record based on the detail type you’ve specified.

DetailType.description: Specifies the type of information that you’re adding to the tracked communication record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

Name.description: The name of the tracked communication detail.

TrackedCommunicationId.description: The parent tracked communication record you're adding information to.
